publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4262 Margaret Mitchell: East Ayrshire Carers Centre—That the Parliament congratulates East Ayrshire Council on its recent Provost’s Charity Ball, which raised £14,766 for the East Ayrshire Carers Centre; notes that the charity is the first to be adopted by the council and that the centre was officially opened by HRH The Princess Royal on 15 April 2009; welcomes that Dalmellington House will be a luxurious facility to be used by carers from throughout the United Kingdom for a relaxing holiday and to provide training for young carers, and wishes the East Ayrshire Carers Centre well in its continued work.

S3M-4262 Margaret Mitchell: East Ayrshire Carers Centre—That the Parliament congratulates East Ayrshire Council on its recent Provost’s Charity Ball, which raised £14,766 for the East Ayrshire Carers Centre; notes that the charity is the first to be adopted by the council and that the centre was officially opened by HRH The Princess Royal on 15 April 2009; welcomes that Dalmellington House will be a luxurious facility to be used by carers from throughout the United Kingdom for a relaxing holiday and to provide training for young carers, and wishes the East Ayrshire Carers Centre well in its continued work.

S3M-4262 East Ayrshire Carers Centre (lodged on 28 May 2009) Bill Aitken*, Nanette Milne*, Alasdair Allan*, Jamie McGrigor*, John Lamont*, Kenneth Gibson*, Jackson Carlaw*, Bill Kidd*, Ted Brocklebank*
S3M-4262 East Ayrshire Carers Centre (lodged on 28 May 2009) Sandra White*, Gil Paterson*, Stuart McMillan*
